Some Algorithms Questions You Will Need For Applied ML Scientist Role - Part 4

22 January 2023 - less than 1 min read time
Tags: Algorithms

â€‹ **This post is under construction! **

1. Valid Parentheses

def isValid(self, s: str) -> bool:

    dictionary = {")": "(", "}": "{", "]": "[", "SOS": "SOS"}

    stack = ["SOS"]

    for ch in s:

        if ch in dictionary.keys() and dictionary[ch] == stack[-1]:

            stack.pop()

        else:

            stack.append(ch)

    return len(stack) == 1
